text: Covid-19 #DayOfReflection  https://t.co/tn0O310If6 via @YouTube what a year! My heart goes out to all who have lost loved ones, been ill or lost jobs. We have all been affected by #COVID19 Thanks to  #GreatBritain s #vaccine programme we can look forward to more normal life! https://t.co/lZjLgMKfmG
